data.name: Zero Reflex Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
We are happy to announce that as requested by the community we bring you the Zero Reflex Original Soundtrack completely FREE:)

Now you can enjoy all of your favorite tracks and remember all the moments you died in the game!

Here is the track list:

00. Pause
01. Toxic
02. Candy
03. Rockets
04. Shurikens
05. Eaters
06. Desert Flower
07. Hideout
08. Paper Cut
09. Bubble Burst
10. Hammer Spikes
11. Spiral
12. Hopsy Daisy
13. Clockwork
14. Saws
15. Disco Dekagon
16. Snakes
17. Green Flower
18. Blue Spikes
19. Horns
20. Nodes
21. Cornered
22. Beetle Lilly
23. Black Hole
24. Terminator
25. Vision
26. Victory Track

Enjoy!
